ud7.9:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā mallesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ yena thūṇaṃ nāma mallānaṃ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.
ud7.9:3.4: “samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito mallesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ thūṇaṃ anuppatto”ti.
ud7.9:3.5: () Udapānaṃ tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūresuṃ:
ud7.9:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma yena rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
ud7.9:4.3: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi:
ud7.9:4.4: “iṅgha me tvaṃ, ānanda, etamhā udapānā pānīyaṃ āharā”ti.
ud7.9:5.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud7.9:5.2: “idāni so, bhante, udapāno thūṇeyyakehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūrito:
ud7.9:6.3: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi:
ud7.9:6.4: “iṅgha me tvaṃ, ānanda, etamhā udapānā pānīyaṃ āharā”ti.
ud7.9:6.5: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā pattaṃ gahetvā yena so udapāno tenupasaṅkami.
ud7.9:6.6: Atha kho so udapāno āyasmante ānande upasaṅkamante sabbaṃ taṃ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe aṭṭhāsi.
ud7.9:7.2: “acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho, tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
ud7.9:7.3: Ayañhi so udapāno mayi upasaṅkamante sabbaṃ taṃ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe ṭhito”ti.
ud7.9:7.4: Pattena pānīyaṃ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud7.9:7.6: “acchariyaṃ, bhante, abbhutaṃ, bhante, tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
ud7.9:7.7: Ayañhi so, bhante, udapāno mayi upasaṅkamante sabbaṃ taṃ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe aṭṭhāsi.
ud7.9:7.8: Pivatu bhagavā pānīyaṃ, pivatu sugato pānīyan”ti.
ud7.9:8.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
